mapper.select: select sum(orderlistPriceSum) as orderlistPriceSum, orderlistNumber, orderlistDate, group_concat(orderlistName) as orderlistName from spmorderlist group by orderlistNumber, orderlistID, orderlistDate having orderlistID = #{orderlistID};
select * from spmorderlist where orderlistID = #{orderlistID} and orderlistNumber = #{orderlistNumber};
select distinct(orderlistNumber) as orderlistNumber, orderlistID, orderlistDate from spmorderlist where orderlistID = #{orderlistID} and orderlistNumber = #{orderlistNumber};

select sum(orderlistPriceSum) as sum, orderlistNumber, orderlistDate from spmorderlist group by orderlistNumber, orderlistID, orderlistDate having orderlistID = #{orderlistID} and orderlistNumber = #{orderlistNumber};
